post.author: 김승엽
post.content:
Using the AS/400's Source Entry Utility (SEU), the author shows you how to
delete all lines within a specified range of lines containing a specified
character string (line command DDS). Included are links where you can download
the code he has written.

SOURCE: AS400 Network (Free registration to site required.)
http://www.as400network.com/features/newmf/article.cfm?ID=7115
post.title: AS/400 TIPS:\\"Creating user-defined line commands for SEU, part 1\\"
